original: @136b pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying po'i gzungs /
analyzed: @136b pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying po'i gzungs /
translated: The Dhāraṇī of the Essence of the Six Pāramitās

original: 'phags pa yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble mother, the perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: chos la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: na mo dharma k'a ya /
analyzed: na mo dharma k'a ya /

original: sa bho k'a ya /
analyzed: sa bho k'a ya /

original: nir m'a na k'a ya /
analyzed: nir m'a na k'a ya /

original: tadya th'a / d'a na p'a ra mi t'a /
analyzed: tadya th'a / d'a na p'a ra mi t'a /

original: sh'i la p'a ra mi t'a /
analyzed: sh'i la p'a ra mi t'a /

original: ksh'antam p'a ra mi t'a /🔽b'irya p'a ra mi t'a /
analyzed: ksh'antam p'a ra mi t'a / b'irya p'a ra mi t'a /

original: dhy'a na p'a ra mi t'a /
analyzed: dhy'a na p'a ra mi t'a /

original: pradzny'a pa ra mi t'a /
analyzed: pradzny'a pa ra mi t'a /

original: sarba dharma sh'un+ya t'a sv'ah'a /
analyzed: sarba dharma sh'un+ya t'a sv'ah'a /

original: 'di bzung bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di bzung bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By upholding this, the six perfections will be upheld.

original: stong pa nyid yid la byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid yid la byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Emptiness will be brought to mind.

original: rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na chos thams cad kyi mdo dang / rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na chos thams cad kyi mdo dang / rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: If recited continuously, one will understand the sūtras and elaborations of all dharmas.

original: mtshams med pa lnga byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshams med pa lnga byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The five heinous acts will be purified.

original: ltas ngan pa thams @137a *//
analyzed: ltas ngan pa thams @137a *//

original: cad kyang bzlog go /
analyzed: cad kyang bzlog go /

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying po rdzogs so ////
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying po rdzogs so ////
translated: The essence of the six perfections is complete.
